translation.en: I hereby call this Thompson family meeting to order.
translation.es: Doy por iniciada la reunión de la familia Thompson.

translation.en: Now, if you all please turn to slide one,
you'll see that a third car can actually save the family money over the long run.
translation.es: verán que, a la larga, un tercer auto nos ahorraría dinero.

translation.en: Mine's just GIFs of baby porcupines eating corn on the cob.
translation.es: Solo veo puercoespines bebés comiendo maíz.

translation.en: Because I already know your views on increasing our carbon footprint,
translation.es: Como sé lo que opinas sobre aumentar la huella de carbono,

translation.en: so your presentation is just Best of Baby Animals.
translation.es: solo te puse fotos de animales bebés.

translation.en: Oh. Good thinking.
So, Mom, Dad, if you'll please turn to slide two,
translation.es: Mamá, papá, si pasan a la siguiente diapositiva,

translation.en: you'll see that my learner's permit driving record is blemish-free.
translation.es: verán que no he cometido infracciones.

translation.en: Did you hire character witnesses again?
If that's your driver's ed teacher, he's not staying for dinner.
translation.es: Si es tu instructor, no lo invitaré a cenar.

translation.en: Where were you?
I've been waiting at the train station all day.
translation.es: Los esperé todo el día en la estación.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Nick. Nicole?
Nicole Patterson? I'm here to live with you.
translation.es: Nicole Patterson. Vengo a vivir con ustedes.

translation.en: Okay, what?
You didn't get the memo?
Was this an actual or metaphorical memo?
They said they called and emailed.
-[Nick sobs] -Okay, sweetie. Just tell us what happened.
translation.es: Está bien, cariño. Cuéntanos qué pasó.

translation.en: What happened is... my parents...
translation.es: Lo que pasó es que mis padres...

translation.en: died in a car accident six months ago,
translation.es: ...murieron en un accidente hace seis meses.

translation.en: and I've been in foster care until they could find some relatives,
translation.es: Estuve en hogares de acogida mientras buscaban familiares.

translation.en: and then they said they found my dad's second cousin twice removed,
translation.es: Dijeron que hallaron a un primo lejano de mi papá en segundo grado,

translation.en: or something, and you were supposed to pick me up at the train station.
translation.es: Dijeron que hallaron a un primo lejano de mi papá en segundo grado, y que me recogería en la estación.

translation.en: You don't know what I'm talking about. Now I'll have to go back to foster care!
translation.es: No saben de qué hablo. Tendré que volver al hogar de acogida.

translation.en: Hang on a second. Nobody's making you go anywhere.
We'll get to the bottom of this. You just never clarified if the memo was real.
translation.es: Llegaremos al fondo de esto. ¿Pero quién nos avisaría qué cosa?

translation.en: Here's the letter from the state.
Here's a picture of my great-grandma with, I guess, your grandma, or something.
translation.es: Esta es una foto de mi bisabuela con tu abuela.

translation.en: Oh, Grandma Liza!
And they gave me this family tree. Oh God, this is a total nightmare!
translation.es: Y me dieron este árbol genealógico. ¡Esto es una pesadilla!

translation.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath.
Molly, why don't you take...
-Nick! -Nick...
to get something to eat while we sort this out.
Hi, I'm Molly. Do you like quinoa?
translation.es: Hola, soy Molly. ¿Te gusta la quinoa?

translation.en: Or is this more of an ice cream situation?
Again, I'm so, so sorry about the mix-up, folks.
translation.es: Les vuelvo a pedir disculpas por la confusión.

translation.en: I have got egg on my face.
Oh, this is more than egg. This is a quiche.
translation.es: Más que un tomate, diría como una salsa marinara.

translation.en: You quiched us.
Mistakes happen. Don't beat yourself up about it.
Bye-bye.
Can you believe that this social services coordinator was coordinating with another Ed Thompson?
translation.es: ¿La coordinadora de servicios sociales coordinó con otro Ed Thompson?

translation.en: I feel so generic!
-I wish I had a cool nickname. -Ooh, how about Laser?
translation.es: - Quisiera tener un apodo genial. - ¿Cómo Láser?

translation.en: -No. -Yes.
[sighs] All right, well...
this is, uh, quite a shock.
We were literally caught with our pants down.
That's literally not what literally means.
Irregardless...
we are problem solvers. We'll make this work.
So where's my room? Well, that's a problem. I have no idea.
translation.es: - ¿Y mi cuarto? - Qué problema, no tengo idea.

translation.en: Nick can stay with me in my room.
translation.es: Yo puedo compartir mi cuarto con Nick.

translation.en: Seriously? I'm not even allowed in your room.
translation.es: ¿En serio? A mí no me dejas entrar.

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you where you can put your stuff
translation.es: Ven, te mostraré dónde dejar tus cosas

translation.en: and how to follow me on Snap and Insta. Not Facebook. Mom joined.
translation.es: y cómo seguirme en Snapchat e Instagram. En Facebook no, ahí está mamá.

translation.en: So this is going to be our room. That sofa pulls out into a bed.
translation.es: Este será nuestro cuarto. El sofá se convierte en cama y es más cómodo de lo que parece.

translation.en: But don't worry, it's more comfortable than it looks.
translation.es: El sofá se convierte en cama y es más cómodo de lo que parece.

translation.en: You're being so nice to me.
I really appreciate this.
Hey, I care about helping people.
translation.es: Me gusta ayudar a la gente.

translation.en: It's kind of my thing.
My thing is watching old Rocky and Bullwinkle cartoons,
translation.es: Lo mío es ver viejos episodios de Rocky y Bullwinkle,

translation.en: but I like your thing, too.
You can put your stuff here, and the Wi-Fi is "ThompsonsRule!"
translation.es: Deja todo aquí. La contraseña del Wi-Fi es: "losgenialesthompson",

translation.en: All one word, cap T, cap R, exclam.
I know.
Hey, can I take a shower or something?
I haven't changed my clothes in, like, two days.
translation.es: Hace dos días que no me cambio.

translation.en: Wow, that's super real.
The bathroom's in through there.
Thanks...
for everything.
I'm in.
I really like her.
Of course you like her. She's an orphan.
translation.es: Claro que te agrada, es huérfana.

translation.en: Your friend Becky is going to be so jealous.
translation.es: Tu amiga Becky se pondrá celosa.

translation.en: You must be tired of her hogging all the attention with her brother's tumor.
translation.es: No podrá acaparar toda la atención con el tumor de su hermano.

translation.en: -I don't care what Becky thinks. -Hey.
translation.es: No me importa Becky. Puedes disfrazar a Nick de indigente y tomarte fotos con ella en el basural.

translation.en: Maybe you can dress Nick up like a hobo and take selfies down at the dump.
translation.es: Puedes disfrazar a Nick de indigente y tomarte fotos con ella en el basural.

translation.en: So, she's staying?
I'm just gonna say what your father and I are both thinking.
translation.es: Solo diré lo que ambos pensamos.

translation.en: Nick can't stay here.
Wait, what?
That's not what I was thinking. I was thinking the exact opposite.
translation.es: Eso es todo lo contrario a lo que pienso.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Because you're talking about raising another child, like, forever.
translation.es: Sería como criar a otro hijo... para siempre.

translation.en: Not forever. Just 'til she's been with us long enough to need therapy.
translation.es: No para siempre, solo hasta hacerle necesitar terapia.

translation.en: That sounds like a worthy goal, but I'm busy right now,
translation.es: Suena genial, pero estoy muy ocupada.

translation.en: with the cookbook and restaurant. And the auditions for Top Chef coming up.
translation.es: Tengo mi libro, el restaurante y lo de Top Chef, no lo olvides.

translation.en: Believe me, no one can forget because you talk about it all the time.
translation.es: Créeme, nadie puede olvidarlo. Hablas de eso todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Guys.
Mom's got a point. I mean, she's just being realistic here.
translation.es: Mamá tiene razón, está siendo realista.

translation.en: Exactly.
Look, I get that Nick's situation is sad.
translation.es: Sé que la situación de Nick es triste.

translation.en: Super sad.
So sad.
But why does that have to make our situation sad?
translation.es: Pero ¿eso debe hacer que nuestra situación sea triste?

translation.en: Because she's family.
translation.es: Sí, porque es de la familia.

translation.en: She's such a distant relative, we could legally get married.
translation.es: Es un familiar tan lejano que hasta podríamos casarnos.

translation.en: So what, you just wanna kick her out?
No. No one's saying kick her out.
translation.es: No, nadie dice que la echemos.

translation.en: I'm just saying, why does she have to stay... here?
translation.es: Solo me pregunto por qué tiene que quedarse aquí.

translation.en: I'll tell you why she has to stay here. Because she's a child who needs us.
translation.es: Te diré por qué: porque es una niña y nos necesita.

translation.en: Do I want another kid? No, I don't even want these two.
translation.es: ¿Quiero otro hijo? No, ni siquiera quiero estos.

translation.en: Just a joke, guys.
I love you so much, so much, but the point is...
translation.es: Los amo muchísimo. Pero el punto es...

translation.en: that she's my second cousin, and she's already been removed twice.
translation.es: ...que es mi prima lejana en segundo grado.

translation.en: We can't do it to her a third time.
translation.es: ¡No dejemos que se aleje hasta un tercer grado!

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think that's what that means.
It doesn't matter. We can't kick her out on the street. That's not who we are.
translation.es: No importa, no podemos echarla. No somos así.

translation.en: Dad's right. We have to do the right thing here.
translation.es: Papá tiene razón. Debemos hacer lo correcto.

translation.en: I vote she stays.
This isn't a reality show. You don't get to vote her on or off the island.
translation.es: Esto no es un reality show donde se vota la permanencia.

translation.en: Everyone's opinion matters.
And thank you, Jeremy. I'm glad to see you coming around on this.
Yeah, you know, me too.
Because raising a child is expensive
translation.es: Criar a alguien más será caro.

translation.en: and we'll have to make sacrifices.
translation.es: Criar a alguien más será caro. Pero haremos sacrificios, como olvidar el auto que querías.

translation.en: And first to go will be that new car you wanted.
translation.es: Pero haremos sacrificios, como olvidar el auto que querías.

translation.en: You know, and for the record, I was gonna say yes.
translation.es: Para que sepas, yo iba a decir que sí.

translation.en: Seriously?
I change my vote. I change my vote.
I vote for the car.
You can't change your vote.
[Liz] Wait. This is a tie,
-and the tie goes to the runner. -[Jeremy] What does that even mean?
translation.es: - Y la cabeza desempata. - ¿Qué significa eso?

translation.en: So does she want Spanish or French?
You can give her Klingon for all I care. This is just temporary.
translation.es: Por mí, que estudie klingon. Será por poco tiempo.

translation.en: So Spanish?
[Nick] Wow.
Looks like you're a big deal around here.
Yeah, I know.
Slow your roll.
You're sophomore class rep, not King of the North.
translation.es: Eres representante de la clase, no rey del Norte.

translation.en: Nick, sweetie...
I know this is a difficult situation, and you could probably use some sort of inspirational speech right now.
translation.es: Sé que es una situación compleja y que necesitas oír algo inspirador.

translation.en: So... hold onto your dreams and...
translation.es: Así que aférrate a tus sueños,

translation.en: reach for the stars...
and seize the day.
Okay.
Bye.
So Jeremy's kind of full of himself.
Totally.
He even keeps a future resume on his phone
to remind him of all the things he needs to accomplish by the time he's 35.
translation.es: para recordar lo que debe lograr antes de los 35 años.

translation.en: Spoiler alert, he becomes president.
Well, he doesn't seem to like me.
I guess he just doesn't want some sketchy foster kid living in his house.
translation.es: Supongo que no quiere vivir con una chica adoptiva rara.

translation.en: Hey, just because you haven't been afforded the same opportunities we have, doesn't make you sketchy.
translation.es: Oye, no eres rara por no haber tenido las mismas oportunidades que nosotros.

translation.en: Oh, my God, it means so much to hear you say that.
translation.es: Gracias, significa mucho que digas eso.

translation.en: I can really tell you care. That's my gift.
translation.es: - Se nota que te preocupas. - Ese es mi don.

translation.en: Well, I wish everyone saw it that way.
Think you could talk to Jeremy for me?
I totally would, honest,
but Jeremy only cares about Jeremy.
translation.es: Pero a Jeremy solo le interesa él mismo.

translation.en: Sorry.
Big news, everyone.
This is Nick.
She's come to live with us because...
her parents died in a car crash.
So you're like...
a for real orphan?
Uh... yeah, I guess so.
Wow.
-Nick'll want to join our volunteer squad. -Your what?
translation.es: - Nick se unirá al escuadrón de ayuda. - ¿Al qué?

translation.en: We volunteer at soup kitchens, hospitals, old folks' homes.
translation.es: Ayudamos en comedores comunitarios, hospitales, hogares...

translation.en: We're kind of Insta-famous.
Wow. You guys are super woke.
Totally.
Oh, wow, Molly. I just noticed.
You're wearing a top from a major trans-national corporate retailer.
translation.es: Estás usando la camiseta de una enorme multinacional.

translation.en: I am?
We're only shopping at Helping the Homeless Thrift Stores now.
translation.es: Ahora solo compramos en tiendas benéficas.

translation.en: You know, #childlabor.
Actually, Helping the Homeless
translation.es: Bueno, algunas tiendas benéficas solo donan...

translation.en: only donates nine percent of its profits to the homeless.
translation.es: Bueno, algunas tiendas benéficas solo donan... ...un 9 % de sus ganancias a las personas sin hogar.

translation.en: Its CEO lives in Aspen.
translation.es: Tienen gerentes que viven en Aspen.

translation.en: And true fact, supporting clothes manufacturers in developing nations
translation.es: Además, apoyar a los fabricantes de países en desarrollo

translation.en: lifts millions out of poverty every year.
translation.es: saca a millones de la pobreza cada año.

translation.en: [stammers] I knew that.
You know what? I'll talk to Jeremy and see what I can do.
Okay, people,
let's take out your chloroform and prepare to anesthetize your frogs.
translation.es: Tomen el cloroformo y anestesien a sus ranas.

translation.en: Stand with me to save the frogs!
What do we want? Animal rights!
When do we want it? Now!
Point of order, I move we table this and send it to committee.
translation.es: Propongo que enviemos esto al comité.

translation.en: You're not supposed to be in here. Student council members only.
translation.es: No puedes entrar, es solo para miembros del consejo.

translation.en: We're trying to pass a critical dance budget.
Spotify and five bucks worth of streamers...
translation.es: Spotify y cinco dólares para el que haga la lista.

translation.en: Problem solved.
Now come talk in the hallway.
Don't underestimate the work we do on student council. It benefits the whole school.
translation.es: No subestimes nuestro trabajo, beneficia a toda la escuela.

translation.en: Says the dictator who canceled our meals on wheels program.
translation.es: Dice el dictador que canceló el programa de entrega de comidas.

translation.en: Because the insurance was cost-prohibitive.
translation.es: Porque el seguro era muy caro.

translation.en: They could've all come to the ice cream social if you hadn't staged a protest.
translation.es: Podrían haber venido por el helado, si no hubieses protestado.

translation.en: Because ice cream isn't fair to the lactose intolerant.
translation.es: El helado no sirve para los intolerantes a la lactosa.

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of intolerant, why are you being such a jerk to Nick?
translation.es: Y hablando de intolerantes, ¿por qué tratas mal a Nick?

translation.en: There's something weird about that girl.
You're just being judgmental.
Besides, Dad said everything was legit.
translation.es: Además, papá dijo que todo era real.

translation.en: I'm not buying it. Girls don't just show up on your doorstep.
translation.es: No lo creo, las chicas no se aparecen así de la nada.

translation.en: Well, not yours.
Admit it, all you care about is getting your stupid car.
translation.es: Admítelo, solo te importa tu estúpido auto.

translation.en: Which, by the way, is killing our planet, thank you very much.
translation.es: Que, debo decir, mata al planeta.

translation.en: And all you care about is your social media blowing up
translation.es: Y a ti solo te importan las redes sociales

translation.en: because your latest pet project happens to be a human.
translation.es: y mostrar tu último proyecto, que es un ser humano.

translation.en: That's offensive.
I care about making the world a better place.
translation.es: Me preocupa hacer del mundo un lugar mejor.

translation.en: Becky's the one turning everything into a competition.
translation.es: Becky es la que compite por todo.

translation.en: Look, promise me you'll try and be nice to Nick.
translation.es: Mira, solo prométeme que intentarás ser amable con ella.

translation.en: The only thing I can promise you
is I'm gonna find out what's really going on with her.
Where is your new best friend, anyway?
How did you like my performance yesterday?
Well, to be honest, Dorothy, it was a bit sloppy.
translation.es: La verdad, fue un poco descuidada, Dorothy.

translation.en: What if they figured out that you and Sam are my real foster parents?
translation.es: ¿Y si descubrían que tú y Sam son mis padres adoptivos?

translation.en: Your pictures are online in the state database.
translation.es: Sus fotos están en la base de datos del estado.

translation.en: Well, obviously, they didn't look.
But you could've at least worn a disguise.
My disguise was a pantsuit.
It's true. She never wears those.
translation.es: Es verdad, ella nunca usa eso.

translation.en: Listen...
How's the plan going?
Good. They don't suspect anything.
They better not, after all the money we spent on the documents.
translation.es: Eso espero, gasté mucho en los documentos.

translation.en: You know how much a fake court order costs?
Yeah. I can get one in an hour for 30 bucks.
That would've saved me $500!
It still seems like it's an awful lot of effort just to rob a random family.
translation.es: Aún me parece demasiado esfuerzo para robarle a una sola familia.

translation.en: Really, it's too much effort for a $50,000 score?
They have two high-end cars, jewelry, watches, silverware.
translation.es: Tienen dos autos de lujo, joyas, relojes, vajilla fina...

translation.en: And with me on the inside,
there's no messy break-in, no alarms, no surprises.
translation.es: no hay que forzar nada, no hay alarmas ni sorpresas.

translation.en: Okay, so how do you plan to knock 'em out?
Don't worry. Leave it to me. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
translation.es: Eso déjenmelo a mí. Les avisaré cuando esté lista.

translation.en: You're already ready.
In and out, easy-peasy. That's the plan.
translation.es: Entramos y salimos, así era el plan.

translation.en: I'm on the inside,
translation.es: Yo soy la que está adentro,

translation.en: so I make the call.
translation.es: así que yo soy la que decide.

translation.en: And we clean them out
when I say so.
And can I borrow 20 bucks?
You would not believe what they charge for a latte at this school.
translation.es: Los cafés son carísimos en esta escuela.

translation.en: Okay, listen up, people.
We are doing the orecchiette with a pork fennel sausage.
translation.es: Haremos orecchiette con salchichas de cerdo e hinojo.

translation.en: The special is a brown-sugar ricotta and egg raviolo.
translation.es: Como especial, ricota con azúcar morena y ravioles.

translation.en: Okay, we open in two hours, so get busy cooking or...
translation.es: Bien, abrimos en dos horas, así que a cocinar...

translation.en: [all] Get busy collecting unemployment.
Nick, what are you doing here?
Well, back at the foster home, all the kids had to pull their weight.
translation.es: En el hogar de acogida, todos debíamos trabajar.

translation.en: So I thought I could help out. I know my way around restaurants.
translation.es: Vine a ayudar, tengo experiencia en restaurantes.

translation.en: That is so thoughtful slash depressing.
translation.es: Eso es tan considerado y deprimente.

translation.en: But thanks, everything's under control here.
Does that look like fennel to you?
Sorry, I'm obviously too busy to babysit.
translation.es: Disculpa, estoy muy ocupada para cuidarte.

translation.en: Is everyone here completely incompetent?
Cut that.
Wow, that's impressive.
Where did you learn to do that?
I was a cocktail waitress in Vegas for a couple years.
translation.es: Fui mesera en un bar de Las Vegas.

translation.en: Kidding.
I told you, I have some experience in restaurants.
translation.es: Te dije que tenía experiencia en restaurantes.

translation.en: Besides, I like working.
It makes me feel... useful.
Okay, I guess we could use some help around here.
translation.es: Supongo que me vendría bien la ayuda.

translation.en: But if the child labor people show up, you are 18.
translation.es: Pero si viene un inspector, tienes 18 años.

translation.en: Oh, hey.
How was your day?
What do you mean?
I don't know, isn't that like a standard question kids ask their dad?
translation.es: ¿No es algo que todos los hijos les preguntan a sus padres?

translation.en: Maybe in 1955, but not my kids.
translation.es: Tal vez en 1955, pero mis hijos no.

translation.en: Well, their loss.
Actually...
to tell you the truth, I did have quite a day.
translation.es: la verdad es que tuve un gran día.

translation.en: You see, I'm a senior loan officer at a bank, I have to decide who to give loans to.
translation.es: Soy agente de préstamos en un banco, y decido a quién prestarle dinero.

translation.en: That sounds really interesting.
It does?
Yeah, I mean, don't you get all sorts of fascinating people coming into your bank all the time?
translation.es: Sí, ¿no van a verte toda clase de personas fascinantes todo el tiempo?

translation.en: Actually, yes, I do.
And they must have all kinds of stories to tell,
translation.es: Todos con una historia que contar,

translation.en: trying to buy a house or start a business.
translation.es: que quieren comprar una casa o empezar un negocio.

translation.en: If you think about it, you're kind of in the dream business...
translation.es: Si lo piensas, trabajas en el mercado de los sueños.

translation.en: making people's dreams come true.
translation.es: Haces realidad los sueños de la gente.

translation.en: Wow.
You really get me.
It's just, my dad got a loan to start a business once.
translation.es: Una vez, mi papá recibió un préstamo para empezar su negocio.

translation.en: He worked hard his whole life,
translation.es: Trabajó muy duro toda su vida,

translation.en: and I remember when I was, I don't know, maybe just like four or five...
translation.es: y recuerdo que, cuando yo tenía cuatro o cinco años,

translation.en: he came home one night with a big cake
translation.es: llegó a casa una noche con un gran pastel...

translation.en: with white frosting and these little pink flowers on top.
translation.es: ...con glaseado blanco y florcitas rosadas encima.

translation.en: You should have seen the look in his eye.
I remember it like it was yesterday.
He was proud.
And so was I.
Yeah.
I have seen that look many times.
translation.es: He visto esa mirada muchas veces.

translation.en: There's one lady who wants to open a yoga studio. -She-- -[cell phone beeps]
translation.es: Hay una señora que quiere abrir un estudio de yoga y...

translation.en: Can you hold that thought?
I've gotta answer this message about my...
math homework.
Don't worry about it. I'm terrible at math, and I work at a bank.
translation.es: Tranquila. Odio las matemáticas, y trabajo en un banco.

translation.en: That's what calculators are for.
Oh, good. You got my text.
So, what's your real name?
Nicole Patterson is my real name.
Then, uh, who's Nicole Masipag?
That's also my name.
After my parents died...
I sometimes used my mom's last name.
translation.es: A veces uso el apellido de mi mamá.

translation.en: I don't know why.
I guess I just wanted something to remember her by.
translation.es: Supongo que en honor a su recuerdo.

translation.en: What gives you the right to go through my stuff?
Well, technically, it's Molly's room, so you have no real expectation of privacy here.
translation.es: Bueno, es el cuarto de Molly. No pretendas tener privacidad.

translation.en: Why do you hate me so much?
I don't hate you.
I just don't trust you.
Hey, I get it.
You're obviously super-smart, in a serial killer kind of way.
translation.es: Obviamente eres muy inteligente, como un asesino serial.

translation.en: Uh, thanks?
And you're a natural leader.
So you think it's your job to protect everyone.
translation.es: Crees que tu deber es proteger a todos.

translation.en: But you don't have to worry about me.
translation.es: Pero no te preocupes por mí.

translation.en: I'm not trying to cause a disturbance in the Force.
translation.es: No voy a perturbar la fuerza.

translation.en: Sorry.
I saw your Star Wars pajamas in the laundry.
translation.es: Vi tu pijama de La guerra de las galaxias.

translation.en: You're smooth. You're a lot smarter than you seem.
translation.es: Eres lista, mucho más de lo que pareces.

translation.en: Wow.
Rude.
Look, I know this isn't just about me ruining that new car for you.
translation.es: Sé que esto no es por arruinar lo de tu auto nuevo.

translation.en: Maybe you're just afraid of sharing everything else you do have
translation.es: Tal vez te asusta compartir todo lo que tienes...

translation.en: with someone you don't know.
I don't know what you're up to, but I'm gonna find out.
translation.es: No sé qué tramas, pero lo descubriré.

translation.en: I'm not up to anything.
I'm just a girl who needs a family.
translation.es: Solo soy una chica que necesita una familia.

translation.en: Okay?
Are we good?
Oh, we're far from good... Nick.
Dorothy, it's me. I'm pulling the trigger.
translation.es: Dorothy, soy yo. Llegó el momento.

translation.en: Tell Sam tonight's the night I knock them out.
translation.es: Dile a Sam que lo haremos esta noche.

translation.en: I'll text you when they're unconscious.
I don't care if it's Armed Forces Week on Wheel of Fortune!
translation.es: ¡No me importa si dan tu programa favorito!

translation.en: Just record it!
[Ed] So...
how was your day?
What do you mean?
That's exactly what I said when Nick asked me. Man.
translation.es: Dije lo mismo cuando Nick me preguntó.

translation.en: Is it possible that we are so self-absorbed we don't even recognize it when someone takes an interest in our lives?
translation.es: ¿Será que estamos tan ensimismados que no notamos cuando alguien se interesa?

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you and your little ward had some time for a tête-à-tête,
translation.es: Me alegra que hayas conversado con tu protegida,

translation.en: but I'm trying to get dinner ready. I could use help.
translation.es: pero intento hacer la cena, podrías ayudar.

translation.en: Yeah, Nick's got me thinking.
I mean...
sometimes I feel like we are strangers living in the same house.
translation.es: A veces parecemos extraños viviendo bajo el mismo techo.

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't we care more about the little things?
translation.es: ¿No deberíamos fijarnos más en las pequeñas cosas?

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds great, but I don't know how to make that happen.
translation.es: Suena genial, pero no sé cómo hacerlo.

translation.en: Neither do I, but maybe we can figure it out.
Remember, we're a team. You're the brain, I'm the heart.
translation.es: Somos un equipo, tú eres el cerebro y yo, el corazón.

translation.en: Together, we make the Thompson body run like clockwork.
Yeah, but why do I always have to be the brain?
translation.es: Pero ¿por qué tengo que ser el cerebro?

translation.en: What's wrong with the brain? Being the brain is a compliment.
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene de malo? Es un halago.

translation.en: Well, sometimes I wanna be the heart.
translation.es: A veces quiero ser el corazón.

translation.en: The heart is the fun job. Everyone loves the heart.
translation.es: Es un trabajo divertido, todos lo aman.

translation.en: Nobody likes the brain. The brain makes you do your homework and empty the dishwasher,
translation.es: Nadie quiere al cerebro, te hace hacer la tarea y lavar los platos.

translation.en: while the heart gets to go out for ice cream and take in stray children.
translation.es: Pero el corazón te compra helado y acoge a niños huérfanos.

translation.en: I'll get it.
It'd better not be another stray child.
translation.es: Espero que no sea otro hijo.

translation.en: Thanks.
What's this?
It's called "pizza."
It's Italian for "food."
I know you're used to fending for yourself, but I made dinner.
translation.es: Tal vez no estés acostumbrada, pero hice la cena.

translation.en: What's the special occasion?
Did someone die?
No, it's Nick's first real dinner with us.
translation.es: No, es la primera cena con Nick.

translation.en: You did this all for me?
-You don't eat together every night? -[Liz] Hell no.
translation.es: ¿No comen siempre juntos? Claro que no.

translation.en: But if you wanna to eat your pizza in your room, that's fine.
translation.es: Pero, si quieres, puedes comer la pizza arriba...

translation.en: I mean, I cooked my signature osso buco risotto, and I am a professional chef,
translation.es: Hice mi risotto de osobuco y soy una chef profesional,

translation.en: but if you just want gas-station-quality pizza--
No. I'm sorry.
It's just, I haven't had a family meal since...
translation.es: Es solo que no como en familia desde...

translation.en: Well, a long time.
Anyway...
this looks nice.
Thank you.
You know, that's not a bad idea.
Maybe Mom could cook dinner for us every night. And then we could eat together, as a family.
translation.es: Mamá podría cocinar todas las noches, y podríamos comer en familia.

translation.en: Sure, no problem.
Or what if we took, like, a family cooking class?
You could literally teach us how to cook and we could take turns making the dinners.
translation.es: Podrías literalmente enseñarnos a cocinar, y nos turnaríamos para hacer la cena.

translation.en: That actually sounds kind of fun.
Cool.
And Dad used "literally" the right way.
-So how was your first day of school? -Pretty good.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo te fue en la escuela? - Muy bien.

translation.en: I stole the driver's ed. car, and got a whole three blocks before they brought me down with a spike strip.
translation.es: Robé un auto y avancé tres cuadras antes de que me atraparan.

translation.en: She's kidding.
You're kidding, right?
It's so hard to tell what's real and what's made up with you, Nick.
translation.es: Es tan difícil saber si dices la verdad.

translation.en: Speaking of which, I heard Jeremy was hoping to get a new car when he gets his license.
translation.es: Oí que Jeremy quería un auto nuevo ahora que obtendrá su licencia.

translation.en: Until you showed up, and we had to make sacrifices.
translation.es: Hasta que llegaste y tuvimos que hacer sacrificios.

translation.en: Well, about that, I had a thought.
I'm working at Liz's restaurant after school now.
translation.es: Trabajo en el restaurante de Liz ahora.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Surprise.
This girl can carry a freakish amount of cannelloni.
We'll talk later.
So maybe you could get a job, too, and buy your own car.
translation.es: Quizás podrías buscar un trabajo y comprarte tu auto.

translation.en: Wait, like a "job" job, where I have to do stuff people don't wanna do?
translation.es: ¿Un trabajo? ¿Y hacer cosas que la gente no quiere hacer?

translation.en: This sounds like a pretty good solution.
It's really smart, Nick.
Thank you so much.
You deserve it.
This calls for a celebration.
I saw some sparkling cider in the fridge.
translation.es: Vi una sidra en el refrigerador.

translation.en: I hope that's okay.
Sure, sounds nice.
Let me go get it.
[Liz] Nick, do you need any help?
No, I'm good.
Well, here's to my new family.
translation.es: Bueno, salud por mi nueva familia.

translation.en: Wait! I want to say something.
I know you've only been here a little while, Nick, but I feel like you coming to us, this is happening for a reason.
translation.es: Sé que llegaste hace poco, Nick, pero siento que todo esto pasó por algo.

translation.en: Oh, it's definitely happening for a reason.
No, I mean, maybe this is exactly what we all need, to shake things up,
translation.es: Me refiero a que quizás necesitábamos un sacudón así

translation.en: make us realize how much we love each other.
translation.es: para darnos cuenta de que nos amamos.

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.es: Esperen, yo también quiero decir algo.

translation.en: I'll admit that I was unsure about you living with us,
translation.es: Admito que no me convencía que te quedaras,

translation.en: but I was wrong.
You know, you kids could learn from this girl,
'cause she has faced hardship, and that has given her character.
translation.es: porque ha enfrentado la adversidad y eso forjó su carácter.

translation.en: Thank you.
Should we drink to that?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
I know you all know that helping people's my thing.
translation.es: Como saben, lo mío es ayudar a la gente.

translation.en: As long as everyone hears about it.
But I...
feel like Nick is the one helping me.
translation.es: ...siento que Nick me ayuda a mí.

translation.en: She's like the sister I never had.
translation.es: Es como la hermana que nunca tuve.

translation.en: Wow. That's actually really sweet.
So... drink?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
I guess, I'll admit, I was also unsure about Nick.
Am unsure.
But at the same time, I don't know...
translation.es: Pero, al mismo tiempo, no sé...

translation.en: if I'm being honest with myself,
maybe I really am just afraid of sharing what I've got.
translation.es: tal vez es verdad que temo compartir.

translation.en: Because the truth is...
I do have a lot.
Now, let's drink to that.
Wait!
I'm sorry. It's just...
you guys don't realize how lucky you are to have each other.
translation.es: ...no saben lo afortunados que son de tener una familia.

translation.en: I guess it's not until you lose your family that you realize that...
translation.es: Supongo que no lo aprecias hasta que lo pierdes...

translation.en: family is everything.
translation.es: La familia es lo más importante.

translation.en: And even if you don't always get along, or you get on each other's nerves,
translation.es: Y aunque a veces te peleen o te saquen de tus casillas,

translation.en: just knowing that your family is there...
translation.es: saber que cuentas con tu familia...

translation.en: somehow it just makes everything better.
Now let's drink before somebody else makes a speech.
translation.es: Brindemos antes de que alguien más hable.

translation.en: No, wait!
What the hell was that?
I just saw a Band-Aid... in the bottle of cider...
translation.es: Vi una bandita en la botella de sidra...

translation.en: A used Band-Aid.
I'm sorry. I'll clean this up. Just...
stay right here.
[Sam] Well?
It's not the right time, Sam.
What do you mean, it's not the right time?
We're down the street in a U-Haul.
I just jumped the gun on calling it.
But the truth is, we need to be patient here.
We can get a lot more than 50 grand if we play this right.
translation.es: podemos conseguir mucho más dinero si lo hacemos bien.

translation.en: How much more?
How does a million sound?
Ed works at a bank.
I can get passwords, account information.
And Liz owns a restaurant. There's cash just lying around.
translation.es: Y Liz tiene un restaurante, hay efectivo tirado por ahí.

translation.en: I saw it with my own eyes.
translation.es: Lo vi con mis propios ojos.

translation.en: So let's not be stupid.
This is a long con.
Why jump at the easy money when we can take the whole enchilada?
translation.es: ¿Por que conformarnos con poco si podemos llevarnos el premio mayor?

translation.en: You better be right.
Trust me.
[Nick] Who wants some gas-station-quality pizza?
Don't worry about Sam and Dorothy.
translation.es: No te preocupes por Sam y Dorothy.

translation.en: I can put them off as long as I need to.
Trust me.
They have no idea this isn't a random family.
translation.es: No saben que esta familia es especial.

translation.en: Well, I'd better go.
I don't want them to get suspicious.
You stay safe, too.
I know, I know.
I love you, too, Dad.
